occupation: Founder and CEO at Durioo Sdn Bhd
headline: Founder Durioo+ (YC W22) | Omar Hana | Digital Durian
summary:
I love to create positive impact. And I'm blessed to be able to do that. 

I am the Founder and CEO of Durioo+. Durioo+ is A Safe Streaming Platform Dedicated for Muslim Children. Our mission is to build a better future by inculcating good values, virtues and Islamic teachings to children.

In Durioo+ we produce, co-produce and license high-quality content for children 1-12 years old. We have 12 Durioo+ Originals and hundreds of licensed episodes on our platform.

Durioo+ is part of the Y Combinator W22 Cohort. Y Combinator is the best Start-Up Accelerator in the world (YC is based in Silicon Valley).

I am also the co-founder and CEO of Digital Durian. At Digital Durian, we create fun and meaningful content for young children. 

Digital Durian founded the cartoon Omar & Hana, which has 3 billion views on YouTube and also more than 7 million subscribers. It is in English, Arabic, Urdu and Malay. In Malaysia, we have more than 300 SKUs sold nationwide. Omar & Hana is aired in 25 countries all around the world - in the UK, MENA, Malaysia and Indonesia.

Digital Durian's also created Didi & Friends, a cartoon that has 5 billion views on YouTube and more than 7 million subscribers. It is dubbed into 7 languages including English, Malay, Spanish, Portuguese and Bahasa Indonesia. Didi & Friends has more than 800 SKUs and in Malaysia.

experiences.title: CEO & Co Founder
experiences.description:
CEO of Digital Durian and also the Executive Producer for our IPs Didi & Friends and Omar & Hana. 

Digital Durian is the creator and co-owner for Didi & Friends (3 billion views | 3.8 million subscribers on YouTube) and Omar & Hana (2 billion views | 3.3 million subscribers on YouTube). 

Our mission is to make people happy and to make high quality meaningful content that makes a different in the world.

As the CEO, I set the company direction and guide/mentor my fantastic Digital Durian team to achieve these goals.

Didi & Friends was born in 2014 - and is a huge hit in Malaysia. We now have 82 songs x 2 minutes and 75 eps x 7 minutes. Besides great viewership on TV and YouTube, we have multiple licensees and more than 800 skus sold nationwide. In 2018, Didi & Friends is now available in 6 languages - Malay, Indonesian, Spanish, Portuguese, Hindi and Thai. English, Vietnamese and Arabic will be launching soon. We target Didi & Friends to be to be among the leading “Value-driven Children’s Edutainment IPs” in the world by 2023.

Omar & Hana is our new IP. Launched in February 2017. This new IP is targeted for young Muslim children around the world to teach them good Islamic values and virtues. Omar & Hana is now aired in more than 25 countries including Malaysia, Indonesia, UK, UAE, Saudi Arabia and other MENA countries. Omar & Hana is in 4 languages - English, Malay, Urdu and Arabic. We target for Omar & Hana to become among the leading "Islamic Value-driven Children's Edutainment IPs" in the world by 2023.

experiences.title: CEO
experiences.description:
Digital Durian Enterprise core business was creating multimedia content, 3d animation, E-Learning and motion graphics. 

This was my first own business venture and CEO in this case really meant chief everything officer. There was so much that we learned. 

During that time, we also diverted the business to do trading wedding gifts, wedding cinematography, wedding cards and personalised wedding gifts. The wedding business taught us a lot in b2c and internet marketing. 

After 5 years, we decided to register our Sdn Bhd and focus on creating our own animation IPs.

experiences.title: 3D Animator
experiences.description: During my time at APV, i created 3D Animations for Tv commercials. Among the tv commercials are Shieldtox, Ayam Brand, Thumbs Up, Dettol, Pantene, Toshiba etc. It was a great experience for me as this was when i learned to look at the very minute detail of things. In other words, every 'frame' counts.

experiences.title: 3D Artist
experiences.description: I was the first employee at NuOrg Sdn Bhd. Here, I acquired huge amount of knowledge in the 3D industry.

education.description: Attended the e@stanford business programme in 2017.
